location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Henry Wathen, Secretary to Government, Persian Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Brief letter acknowledging receipt of a letter from the Governor in Council at Bombay (Mountstuart Elphinstone) to His Royal Highness the Prince of Shiraz (Ḥosayn-‘Alī Mīrzā) and informing of it having been immediately forwarded to its destination.
